description:
Clip-in when you need to lay down the power, or just ride your bike in whatever shoes you want. Whether you have one bike that commutes through the week and tours on the weekends, or your just clip-in curious, these 2 sided pedals give you options.

  • Versatile 2-sded design has 1 platform side and 1 clip -in side
  • Designed to work with SPD cleats
  • Adjustable tension lets you set your preferred clip-in/clip-out pressure
  • Sealed and serviceable cone bearings
name: Shimano PD-M324 SPD Pedals
